pageContext.analysis: Trump tweeted this above an image that said: "50% approval rating (Rasmussen)"  We're not sure what poll Trump is referring to, as the most recent Rasmussen poll at the time of this tweet had him at 49 percent approval. Rasmussen consistently has a Republican-leaning bias, so the polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight say that an adjusted rating would have shown Trump at 44 percent approval in the poll. On the day of the tweet, Trump had an average approval of 41.9 percent in 538's blended poll rating, along with 52.8 percent disapproval.
